title: Did Elon Musk tweet the picture of dessert from a restaurant in the middle of CIVD-19?
subtitle: Publication of an ice cream picture from the Italian restaurant Boca de Pepo while requests to stay at home were in effect.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The Tesla entrepreneur and the founder of Space X-Ilon Mask tweeted a dessert picture from the Italian restaurant Boca de Pepo with a commentary on "Cream ice cream in a Martini Cup."
